sub_title: 1ste medewerker bediening  bij Bilderberg Hotel De Keizerskroon
summary:
In 2006 I started my study Hotel Management at Deltion College in Zwolle, The Netherlands. During this four years I gained a lot knowledge of the several aspect within the Hospitality Industry. I did three internships where I got experience in all the different departments within hotels, like Housekeeping, Front Office, Banqueting and Food & Beverage. Beside this study I worked at several restaurants to get more work experience.

In 2010 I started at the a Bachelor Hotelmanagement at the University of Applied Siences, Saxion Apeldoorn, The Netherlands. In the first part of my second and third year I organised a food gathering for students and teachers of the Hospitality Business School and in the second part I went for seven months to London for my management internship as a F&B Supervisor at Thistle The Royal Trafalgar & Thistle Piccadilly.

In the third year I followed the semester "Hospitality in International Events" followed by a succesfull internship as trainee F&B Coordinator for Sofitel Legend The Grand Amsterdam where I took responsibility for reservations, promotion and projects related to F&B outlets and operational assistence.

After my internship I have been asked by the Assistent Executive Director i/c of Food & Beverage to stay within Sofitel Legend The Amsterdam as F&B Coordinator. In February 2014 I took the descision to take a new step in my career at a former bib-gourmand restaurant in Harderwijk and wedding location in Hulshorst.

On the first day of 2015 a new adventure started at three Michelin star restaurant De Leest. Here I improved my gastronomy skills on the highest level possible in the Netherlands. After 2,5 year I took another opportunity at Bilderberg where to develop new skills in the hotel-segment. 

I am straight forward and ambitious. I set high goals for my self and do not stop before I achieve my goals. I would like to meet people and love to connect people and work with people with different backgrounds.

awards.title: "Hotello of the Year"
awards.description: As part of the "Food Gala" tradition at the Hospitality Business School, for the first time a special ellection took place. Students and teacher had the opportunity to chose their "Hotello of the Year". At the end of the evening the disclosure took place and I won the first ellection of "Hotello of the Year".

projects.title: Food Gala 2013
projects.description:
Food Gala is a gathering for all the students and teachers of the Hospitality Business School of Saxion.

This year it is the second time that we organized this Hospitality, Wine and Food themed and related party.Together with three other students of the Hospitality Business School I formed the organisation of this event. 

The event was organised in association with highly regarded local and national gastronomic companies as Restaurant 't Nonnetje (one Michelin Star, Harderwijk). Restaurant 't Schultenhues (one Michelin Star, Zuthpen), Restaurant Spicebrush (Apeldoorn) and Restaurant Da Gabriele (Harderwijk). A spectacular dessert buffet made by Traiteur Delicat (Apeldoorn) and a wine local with champagnes and wines of Henri Bloem (Apeldoorn). Entertainment was arranged by Bert Coster & Friends as being a DJ, sax jockey and singer

During the event we organised a special election for Prom Queen and Prom King.

contributors.headline: 1ste medewerker bediening  bij Bilderberg Hotel De Keizerskroon
Supervisor | Sales | Meetings & Events | Revenue | Hospitality | Veluwe | Hotel & Congrescentrum Mennorode

projects.title: Food Gala 2012
projects.description:
Gathering for all the students and teachers of the Hospitality Business School of Saxion.

Event with a Hospitality, Wine and Food theme organised in the beginning of 2012 together with two other students of the Hospitality Business School. 

The event was organised in association with highly regarded local and national gastronomic companies as Restaurant 't Schultenhues (one Michelin Star, Zuthpen), Hotel Gastronomy De Echoput (one Micheling Star, Hoog-Soeren), Restaurant Da Gabriele (Harderwijk), Koppert Cress (Monster), Ovino with Roel Helming, former international ambassador of Champagne (Harderwijk) and Confrérie du Sabre d'Or.

contributors.headline: 1ste medewerker bediening  bij Bilderberg Hotel De Keizerskroon

projects.title: Jong Ondernemen
projects.description:
- Our Task:
For one year I created and managed a Student Company called 'Jong Ondernemen' during my education lower Hospitality Business in coorperation with eight other Hospitality Business Students 'Kamer Van Koophandel Nederland', Rabobank and Deltion College

- Our Mission:
To create a hospitality related product and build up a company to sell our product with a profit.

- Our product:
We created 'The Munny'. A coin holder for the hospitality branch to keep there pay coins together. This to create an easy payment system in clubs and pubs. 

In this student company, I was appointed as Marketing Manager. My job was to promote our company and product into the hospitality branche and hold on good contact with shareholders.  

- Skills
Marketing
Representing
Social Media
Presentating
Teamwork

contributors.headline: 1ste medewerker bediening  bij Bilderberg Hotel De Keizerskroon

courses.name: Practice in College Restaurant and Kitchen

profile_positions.description:
WENTZ staat voor de zaken van Wim en Tina Zwaart. Maar meer dan dat staat WENTZ voor beleving. De beleving die van eten en drinken één groot feest maakt. 
In Restaurant Ratatouille, bij u thuis met Ratatouille Catering of bij Koetshuis Hulshorst.
Natuurlijk met respect voor natuur en medemens. Groenten en kruiden zo van het land, verse vis volgens de viswijzer en vlees en zuivel het liefst van een boer die we persoonlijk de hand kunnen schudden. Samen zijn we verantwoordelijk voor ons lichaam en onze omgeving, bij WENTZ zie, ruik, proef en beleef je dat.

Restaurant Ratatouille 
Hartje binnenstad. Aan hét culinaire plein van Harderwijk. Genieten van de Franse keuken met wereldse uitstapjes. Gemaakt van verse, veelal biologische, ingrediënten. Voor een tafeltje voor twee tot een (privé)diner met familie.

Koetshuis Hulshorst
Verscholen in het groen. In de bossen van Hulshorst. Een prachtplek voor vergadering tot bruiloft (inclusief ja-woord!). Van Spaans feest tot kookworkshop in de kruidentuin. Hier vervullen wij dromen en wensen.
profile_positions.title: Waiter

profile_positions.description:
As student of Hospitality Business School at Saxion, University of Applied Siences I am working since September 2010 as a pr-student for the study Hotel Management.

Is this job I represent the Hotelschool Apeldoorn and Hospitaly Business School of Saxion Hogescholen during several occasions for new students, parents and other interested parties.

- Saxion Open
4 times a year Saxion opens her doors at Enschede, Deventer and Apeldoorn for potential students and her parents to take a look at the school, get an impression of the atmosphere, visit presentations and get in touch with students and teachers
 
- Meeloopdagen:
Organized for potential students to experience a normal day at Saxion. Together with a class of first year students a potential student will follow a full day at Saxion. Here he or she will get a good impression of a normal day at school. 

- Try-out days
Several times during the year Saxion organise a try-out day for potential students to experience Saxion. Difference between a 'Meeloopdag' and a try-out day is that this day is completely organized for the potential students.
profile_positions.title: Pr-Student

profile_positions.description:
After my management traineeship as F&B Coordinator I was asked by the Executive Assistent Manager i/c Food&Beverage to stay within the hotel as F&B Coordinator. With proud I took this opportunity to get the experience at Sofitel Legend The Grand.

As F&B Coordinator at Sofitel Legend The Grand I mainly based at the F&B office. Together with my colleague and coach during my traineeship I assist the F&B manager in his tasks and will be in close touch with the operational departments of F&B.

Departments which are part of F&B are; Bridges inspired by Ron Blaauw, Bridges Bar and Lounge, Dutch Pub the Flying Dutchman, Library 'Or', Inroom Dining (Room service) and Inspired Meetings (Banqueting)

Main tasks are divided in three parts:

Reservations
- Handling of group reservations above eight persons 
- Making proposals and arrangements for (potential) guest 
- Internal communication with all the F&B outlets;
- External communication with bookincentres
- Gifts & vouchers for F&B outlets and related to F&B

Marketing & Events
- Organizing events for special occasions;
- Promotion for the events;
- Internal communication with all the responsible departments;
- External communication and promotion to invited and potential guests.

Operational 
- Operational support to all the F&B outlets during peak times. 
- Assistance of Breakfast, lunch or Dinnershifts at Bridges inspired by Ron Blaauw.
- Assistance at Bar shifts at the Bridges Bar, Library 'Or' and Flying Dutchman.
- Taking care of the F&B rituals. 
- Assistance at Inspired Meetings (Banqueting) during breaks, lunches and dinners.
profile_positions.title: F&B Coordinator
F&B Coordinator Trainee

profile_positions.description:
One Michelin starred restaurant situated at the Vischmarkt in Harderwijk. Awarded by Gault Millau with 16 point and on the 36th place of the Top 100 of culinary magazine 'Lekker'. A modern restaurant lead by owner and Maitre Robert-Jan Nijland and executive chef Michel van Der Kroft.

As waiter I was responsible for the following tasks before, during and after the service:
- Mice en Place
- Welcoming of the guests by arrival
- Serving and explaining the meals to the guests
- Hosting guests during their stay
- Assist the sommeliers with their duties in peak-times.
- Set up of the restaurant after service
profile_positions.title: Waiter

profile_positions.description:
As part of my study Hotelmanagement I went for seven months to London for a Minor / Management traineeship.

I worked as Food and Beverage supervisor at The Royal Trafalgar by Thistle **** & Thistle Piccadilly Hotels ****, two recently refurbished four star hotels in the city centre of London. Both hotels are part of the Thistle & Guoman Hotel Chain. 

As Food and Beverage Supervisor at a Thistle Hotel you will be trusted that the things are right: 

- Responsible for delivering high standards of guest service and ensuring all guest concerns are resolved positively. 

- Supervising a team of Food and Beverage Assistants 

- Following all cash handling / opening / closing procedures 

- Ensuring all team members are trained in line with brand standards 

- Carrying out induction and training for new team members 

- Delivering guest service during breakfast, lunch and afternoon tea shifts.

- Resolving guest issues. 

- Focus on quality of service, food and beverages with an eye for detail.

- Showing leadership during the shifts

- Taking ownership during the shifts.

-  Motivating and stimulating the Food & Beverages team.
profile_positions.title: Food & Beverage Supervisor Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Situated at one of the most beautiful and oldest of Harderwijk: 'De Vischmarkt'. Da Gabriele gives her guests a place to enjoy a typical Mediterranean atmosphere. A cozy but trendy restaurant with place for around the hundred guest and a 400 years old vaulted cellar as aperitif bar.

As Waiter I was responsible for several tasks in the restaurant and bar:

- Welcoming of the guests at arrival
- Explaining special menu's and a la carte selection. 
- Taking orders for food and beverages.
- Serving drinks and food
- Hosting the guests during their stay in the restaurant
profile_positions.title: Waiter

profile_positions.description:
NH Conference Sparrenhorst is a modern and versatile four star hotel, located between the woods of the Veluwe and the Veluwe lake. The large variety of spaces at NH Conference Centre Sparrenhorst makes it very easy for you to find a suitable venue for your conference, seminar, or dinner.

You can choose from 19 meeting rooms, ranging from deluxe conference rooms to modern, tastefully decorated banquet halls. For your conference, party or dinner, NH Conference Centre Sparrenhorst is the place to be!

The Belvédère Theatre is one of the unique features of NH Conference Centre Sparrenhorst. This theatre hall and auditorium is ideally suited to cater for large groups or other meetings, such as presentations, lectures or symposia.

Food & Beverage:
- Preparation of the restaurant, lounge area, bars 
- Taking orders in the Food & Beverage area's
- Assisting kitchen by making orders
- Delivery control

Banqueting:
- Cleaning and set up of the Meeting- and Conference rooms
- Hosting of the guest during meeting and conferences
- Contactperson for trainers
profile_positions.title: Food & Beverage and Banqueting employee
